name: Make My Life Worse
summary: It's the year 2022, in a world where a few people suddenly started developing superpowers during the 20th century. This is highly rare and still not fully understood. Some use their powers for good, some for evil, and some just use it as a tool for daily life or in their careers. Marnie Yao happens to be one of those rare few who has a superpower. But she doesn't really care about any of that. No, what's really important is that she's heartbroken after finding out her favorite VTuber is ending activities, and in that sad state of feeling miserable about it is where our strange tale begins.
